topic.title: Chapter 7
topic.shortdesc: Little Red Riding Hood find out the truth about her grandmother

section.title: Grandma's identity
section.p: "Enough is enough, a lie is a lie, he is not your grandma, for it is I!" A woman came out, an old wooden cupboard, so he really looked like, that ol' Mother Hubbard. She pulled of the clothing, and revealed a sheep, that lay in her bed! Pretending to sleep! "Oh bad Mr. Sheep!" Red said in a heap, "you wanted he treats!" she said in a heap. "oh sorry, I sorry, I won't tell a lie. "I'm selfish, I'm selfish, I wanted a fry"
"Lol, lets just share it then." Little Red said. And all, was happily ever after
